title: California Senate Committee Approves Bill Removing Vaccine Exemptions
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block talks to Dr. Matthew Willis, the public health officer in Marin County, Calif., one of the strongest centers of vaccine opposition. He talks about the state Senate education committee's approval of a bill Wednesday that would require schoolchildren to be vaccinated.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
